Header.title: We are It-neXt
Header.paragraph: We the ItneXt , we bring the best IT assistant and provide the best technology solution for your company and startup and above all we help overcome you technology challenges.

About.paragraph: ItneXt is an amazing It consultant firm that is out to provide to  the comunity and the country at large together with  the citizen attain the best help in technology.Well we have as caption HARDWORK BEATS TALENT WHEN TALENT DOESN'T WORK HARD.

Services.name: Computer Repair
Services.text: we repair and maintain your computers at your satisfaction.

Services.name: Website Building
Services.text: Great, proffesional and responsive website together with hosting and maintenance.

Services.name: Graphic Design
Services.text: Amazing graphic design (both two-Dimension and three-Dimension graphic design).

Services.name: computer Networking
Services.text: We provide you with the best of  computer network and telecommunication.

Services.name: Data Recovery
Services.text: We help you recover your information incase of damage of your computer or laptop

Services.name: IT Support/Consultant
Services.text: We provide you with best of information technology support for your organisation and business
